column5: Hey all,  dont post much, but am on here trolling quite often...  Had a great week away at the cottage (south of Espanola on Lang Lake)and managed to get in some good fishing time   ...Lots of variety, except the one we have been trying to get (walleye)...none the less, had to show you a quick pick of my GF's first 5 pounder...we weighed it on a RAPALA and it hit 5.04oz....nice fight and a beauty!  hope this pic works  if not: cheers!  Yv
Congrats to her!!!  Man, the way she is holding it out to the camera it looks like an 8 lber! Awesome bass!!
nice fish  did she catch it in the mess behind her ?
SWEET fish!!!  Congrats all around!
she did catch it just in front of the mess...  thanks guys!  Yv
Nice one! wish i could get my wife out fishing with me...mind you she would probably school me and annoy the bejeebus out of me
WOW! That fish almost looks like a replica. Very, very clean and unmarked fish! Thanks for sharing!
thats awesome. in about 2 and a half weeks we'll be on lang lake as well and im pumped! any advice your willing to give about the lake,areas and what your using would be great.
That's a BIG bass. What did she catch it with?
Nice fish.Man your GF has BIG hands.

she caught it on a mepps #3 black fury with one of the hooks broken off (it was a two hook!)..  the fish was very healthy...The L. Bass have been very active up there this year..Lunatic..drop me an IM and I can help you out!  Yv
Beautiful fish!  Nice going! I would think it take a lot of guts to throw a Mepps anywhere near that stuff behind her! LOL
Beauties for sure    Congrats to your GF Thanks for sharing Leechman
Wow!  Nice fish.  Congrats to her for sure. "That mess" behind her looks beautiful to me!  I love fishing that kind of water.
good stuff! gotta love fishin with the GF's and even better when they catch some fish!
Damb, Now that's a HOG Congrats to her  -Ben
A couple of trophies there for sure!
What a hog of a bass. The mepps black fury strikes again. Its always worthwhile to have in the tackle box.

Man, forget the 5lber for a second. I took my wife fishing two years ago, she caught a 1lb bass and started screaming in distress when it came out of the water towards her.....she has never gone back with me since. What is your secret?
the secret....start small, and slowly work your way up...
Nice fish, congrats to your gf  Now are you talking catching the fish or the Girlfriend lol
both!
